channel.title: Complete Award List - Needs review to make awards concise and
channel.description:
probably should sort them by category to make them easier to find.
[center][b]Staff Related Awards[/b] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pikastaff.gif[/img] Pikachu Awarded to Mods and Admins.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/santapika.gif[/img] Santa Pikachu Awarded to Admins and Mods, in the festive holiday season.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/valentinepika.gif[/img] Valentine Pikachu Awarded to Admins and Mods, during valentine.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/bulbasaur.gif[/img]MoparScape Moderator Awarded to MoparScape moderators.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/santabulbasaur.gif[/img]Santa Bulbasaur Awarded to MoparScape moderators, in the festive holiday season.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/caterpie.gif[/img] Programming Moderator Awarded to moderators of the programming section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/charmander.gif[/img] Other Moderator Awarded to moderators of the other section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/persian.gif[/img] Games Moderator Awarded to moderators of the games section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pinan2.gif[/img] RS2 Dev Moderator Awarded to moderators of the RS2 dev section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/scarmod.gif[/img] SCAR Moderator Awarded to moderators of the SCAR section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/vulpex.gif[/img] General Moderator Awarded to moderators of the general section.
[img]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/Themes/core/images/moparcraft_admin.png[/img] MoparCraft Admin Awarded to the administrators of MoparCraft.
[img]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/Themes/core/images/moparcraft.gif[/img] Moparcraft Staff Awarded to the staff members of MoparCraft.
[img]http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/mdgsharp.png[/img] MoparGameDev Moderator Awarded to moderators of the MoparGameDev website.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/squirtle.gif[/img] Squirtle Awarded to Ex-Mods and Ex-Admins.
[b]Programming Awards[/b]
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/scarcup.gif[/img] Scar Scripters Awarded to people who are good at scar scripting.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/duke3d.gif[/img] Java Guru Awarded to the best Java Coders.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/duke3dchristmas.gif[/img] XMas Java Guru Awarded to the best Java Coders, in the festive holiday season.
[img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/9647/javacoder.png[/img] Java Coder Awarded to intermediate java programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/Kakuna.gif[/img] VB Awarded to vb coders. (Symbolises the hidden capabilities of vb).
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/Flare.gif[/img]Delphi Awarded to delphi coders. (Symbolises the power of delphi).
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/c.png[/img] C Awarded to the best C programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/togepi.gif[/img] C++ Awarded to skilled C++ coders.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/csharp.png[/img] C# Awarded to skilled C# programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/python.png[/img] Python Awarded to skilled Python programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/lisp.png[/img] Lisp Awarded to the best Lisp programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img] Web Developer Awarded to good web developers (html, php, jsp etc.)
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/srldev.gif[/img] SRL Developer Symbolizes being an SRL Dev.
[b]Miscellaneous Awards[/b]
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/arccup.gif[/img] google Crew Awarded to people who used to be on the google crew.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/batman.gif[/img] Bat Awarded to helpful people.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/dragonite.gif[/img] IRC Legend Awarded to Moparisthebest IRC legends.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/lapras.gif[/img] Graphics Master Awarded to graphics masters of the site.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/SOTWWinner.png[/img] SOTW Winner Awarded to winners of SOTW.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/lpotm.png[/img] LPOTM Winner Awarded to winners of LPOTM.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/mcwaward.png[/img] MCW Winner Awarded to winners of the MoparScape Model Contest competition.
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/bi5r0h.png[/img] Tutorial Author Awarded to the best author writers
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1jrno3.png[/img] Server Helper Awarded to the best helpers in the RuneScape Private Server Help section.
[img]http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/mgd_winner.gif[/img] MoparGameDev Winner (Winter) Awarded to the winter themed MoparGameDev contest.

programming, irc, cars

[hr]
Ok then
http://i.imgur.com/134CO.gif

EDIT - It appears it got chopped at the top, one second
EDIT2 - Fixed

This is actually quite fun

item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

probably should sort them by category to make them easier to find.

[center]Staff Related Awards
Pikachu
Awarded to Mods and Admins.

Santa Pikachu
Awarded to Admins and Mods, in the festive holiday season.

Valentine Pikachu
Awarded to Admins and Mods, during valentine.

MoparScape Moderator
Awarded to MoparScape moderators.

Santa Bulbasaur
Awarded to MoparScape moderators, in the festive holiday season.

Programming Moderator
Awarded to moderators of the programming section.

Other Moderator
Awarded to moderators of the other section.

Games Moderator

RS2 Dev Moderator
Awarded to moderators of the RS2 dev section.

SCAR Moderator
Awarded to moderators of the SCAR section.

General Moderator
Awarded to moderators of the general section.

MoparCraft Admin
Awarded to the administrators of MoparCraft.

Moparcraft Staff
Awarded to the staff members of MoparCraft.

MoparGameDev Moderator

Squirtle
Awarded to Ex-Mods and Ex-Admins.

Programming Awards

Scar Scripters
Awarded to people who are good at scar scripting.

Java Guru
Awarded to the best Java Coders.

Awarded to the best Java Coders, in the festive holiday season.

Java Coder
Awarded to intermediate java programmers.

VB
Awarded to vb coders. (Symbolises the hidden capabilities of vb).

Delphi
Awarded to delphi coders. (Symbolises the power of delphi).

C
Awarded to the best C programmers.

C++
Awarded to skilled C++ coders.

C#

Python

Lisp
Awarded to the best Lisp programmers.

Web Developer
Awarded to good web developers (html, php, jsp etc.)

SRL Developer
Symbolizes being an SRL Dev.

Miscellaneous Awards

google Crew
Awarded to people who used to be on the google crew.

Bat
Awarded to helpful people.

IRC Legend
Awarded to Moparisthebest IRC legends.

Graphics Master
Awarded to graphics masters of the site.

Awarded to winners of SOTW.

Awarded to winners of LPOTM.
